Class Ship

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Ship

public class Ship
extends greenfoot.Actor

A space ship. It comes from space, lands, and releases some Greeps into the world.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Michael Kolling, Davin McCall, Poul Henriksen

Constructor Summary
